text: Allan Joseph MacEachen, OC (July 6, 1921 - September 12, 2017) was a Canadian politician. He was born in Inverness, Nova Scotia. He was the first Deputy Prime Minister of Canada, serving from 1977 to 1979 and 1980 to 1984 during Pierre Trudeau tenure as prime minister. In 2008, he was made an Officer of the Order of Canada. MacEachen died on September 12, 2017 at the age of 96. ==References== ==Other websites== * Allan MacEachen Category:1921 births Category:2017 deaths Category:People from Nova Scotia Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of Canada Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada
